title: Ballet Folklórico Mexicano de Nueva York’s 13th Annual Guelaguetza Festival
description: A cultural festival at Socrates Sculpture Park celebrating Mexican traditions.

title: 46th Annual Thunderbird American Indian Powwow
description: A cultural event at Queens County Farm Museum featuring Thunderbird American Indian dancers. $19 admission supports the scholarship fund and education program.

title: 115th Annual St. Ann's Feast
description: An annual Italian festival held at 7th + Jefferson Streets in Hoboken.

title: Chinatown Night Market's Final Season
description: A vibrant night market at Forsyth Plaza featuring food, shopping, and entertainment.

title: Wax + Stacks: Brooklyn Flea Record Fair
description: A record fair at the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, showcasing vinyl records and music memorabilia.
address: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts (UWS)

title: Brooklyn Summer Beer Wine + Spirits Fest
description: A festival at Brooklyn Navy Yard featuring unlimited samples of beer, wine, and spirits, along with live entertainment and food for purchase.
address: Brooklyn Navy Yard Building 77 Waterfront Promenade, 141 Flushing Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11205

title: 12th Annual Stoops Summer Festival
description: A community festival featuring art crawls and a block party at Stuyvesant Ave + Decatur St in Bed-Stuy.

title: Yard Mart Print Camp: Open Air Artisan Market + Screen Printing Workshop
description: An artisan market and workshop at Nowadays in Ridgewood.

title: Ninth Annual Kingsland Wildflowers Festival
description: A festival at Kingsland Wildflowers Green Roof featuring community engagement and activities.
address: Kingsland Wildflowers Green Roof + Community Engagement Center, Greenpoint

title: FAD Market: Summer Pop-Up
description: A summer pop-up market at St. Paul’s Church in Boerum Hill/Cobble Hill.
address: St. Paul’s Church, Boerum Hill/Cobble Hill

title: African Pop-Up Festival: Summer Edition
description: A cultural festival at Hillel Plaza featuring African food, music, and crafts.
